title: Diana needs a nerf
body: diana's kits good but is just broken, can tower dive me from full health and cant stop her

replies.body:
Hey there,

You appear to have become lost along your travels and stumbled into the incorrect board, perhaps you should turn back and head in the other direction toward [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy).
